title: CryptoMei_xie
author: CryptoMei_xie
content: https://choi.network/ https://t.me/ChoiToken  [ANN] CHOI NETWORK | CHOI artificial intelligence  We aim to automatically manage the CHOI Token project thanks to artificial intelligence.By combining artificial intelligence and blockchain technology, we have presented an automatically, artificial intelligence managed project. Fee fees, project decisions, strategies, trading targets and all project-related decisions are made with CHOI artificial intelligence.Choi Network aims to automatically manage the CHOI Token project thanks to an artificial intelligence it has created. It was created to be governed only by the decisions of artificial intelligence.✅ Artificial Intelligence✅ Community Based✅ Sustainable Infrastructure91.2% of the Choi Token is released for the community, it keeps 100% tokens in circulation. It offers a completely community-obtainable environment, eliminating the risk of dumping.(The 8.8% rate was taken by the community administrators for marketing, server and plugin costs.)Analytical Contracts and the Study of Artificial IntelligenceThe AI scans each token in the Binance Smart Chain network for the existing Choi Token. It makes the most accurate/logical decisions on Choi Token by using the available statistical (Holders, Market Volume, Fee) data from contract types.
